author: Ed Kilgore
title: The Lockdown Backlash May Be the New Tea Party Movement
description: Fury at the lockdown, and unprecedented federal spending, is predictably on the rise. Trump may be tempted to assume leadership of the cause.
content: At first it was just random resistance from rural or Mountain West areas hardly affected initially by the coronavirus pandemic. But now its spreading to places near COVID-19 hot spots where some people think restrictive measures to stop the spread of the coro… [+5781 chars]
